Character: Main Protagonist.description: Placeholder for the story's central hero.

Character: Main Antagonist.description: Placeholder for the primary opposing force.

Location: Capital City.description: Major setting of the plot where many events take place.

Object: Mysterious Artifact.description: Important item that drives the narrative forward.

Event: Civil Uprising.description: A pivotal event that changes the world order.

Trait: Impulsive.description: Used to describe a character who acts quickly without planning.
